dublin_core.dcvalue: Pleural lipomas are rare tumours usually arising from the parietal pleura which are often asymptomatic and observed incidentally We describe the clinicopathological features of a case of lipoma arising from the visceral pleura accidentally discovered in a 69 year old ma at autopsy A review of the literature concerning pleural lipomas is also presented
[Visceral pleural lipoma: description of a autopsy case].
